    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Main loop in which chess runs. If either players kings are in a checkmate the game ends. If a player resigns the game also ends.
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • kingDead

        public static boolean kingDead(objects.Piece[][] board,
                               boolean turn)
        Checks if a move puts the king in check
        Parameters:
        board - The board in which chess is being played on
        turn - True if it is the user's turn is white, False is black
        Returns:
        True if a move can remove the king

      • staleMate

        public static boolean staleMate(objects.Piece[][] board,
                                boolean turn)
        A check to see if there is no valid move when the king is not in check
        Parameters:
        board - The board in which chess is being played on
        turn - True if it is the user's turn is white, False is black
        Returns:
        True if the board is in a stalemate

        turn - The board in which chess is being played on

        Parameters:

        arr - An int[] array that contains the moves of the user

      • endGame

        Parameters:

        draw - True if outcome is a draw
